name: Grand Theft GPU
description:
Made for the AI And Games Jam 2021, Grand Theft GPU is a top down stealth game where you need to steal a shipment of GPUs while hiding from swarm based drone security system.

For this game I was experimenting with flock/swarm behavior using the Boids algorithm from this tutorial from Sebastian Lague. I combined the flock behavior on some mini drones that communicate with a master drone that moves on a nav-mesh.
